B3390C275EC54800976B7A9C3028986D.description:
Analyze and
document how music is
used to inform or change
beliefs, values, and/or
behaviors of an individual
or society.

3E3DA971B55846BFAB0099901D547333.description:
With limited
guidance, make
connections between
music and other common
core subjects, including the
arts, through creating,
performing, or responding
to music.

A1F50BB63A7A4B96BC61E7E0FE36ECE9.description:
With limited
guidance, connect music
to other people’s
personal experiences
when creating,
performing, or
responding to music.

ED37026D889146BCA282FC570B817B4D.description:
With limited
guidance, connect music
to personal experience
through creating,
performing, or
responding to music.

102D434F70D546FCAB960C0F230F7838.description:
Describe the
relationships of music
to dance, theatre, the
visual arts, media arts
and other disciplines.

8FE86DBA483446358E18B22112F79B7C.description:
Describe and
explain factors that
impact the role of music
in the lives of people.

0033A5B64C714D49A5E63E7018031090.description:
Describe and
justify how music is a
form of personal
communication and
expression.

F783552CEEAF4331A91D3E949A54464B.description:
Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural, and historical
context to deepen understanding.

01581B14F6F24ACA8D1D11E4D747ACF2.description:
Identify and
document the benefits
of, and opportunities
for, making music both
inside and outside of
school and/or music
class, including afterschool programs and
extracurricular
opportunities.

0A79AFBBCA8D4976AE48A9A194976CA5.description:
Identify
personal and cultural
influences as well as
creative preferences in
creating, performing,
and responding to
music.

FEC7671202AA44D890DB779670D4E61A.description:
Describe how
interests, experiences,
knowledge, and skills
relate to personal
choices and musical
intentions when
creating, performing,
and responding to
music.

6AE9514C4AF44255AED1C59C7824E9D4.description: Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

D9E593F745D7474391FFC53D1E74D74F.description:
Compare and
document musical
elements from two or
more contrasting
selections of music.

E9F596A4EBF241E7B6BF1CCBC83E9F2D.description:
Engage
appropriately as an
active listener in
formal and informal
settings, paying
attention to audience
etiquette appropriate
to the genre of music.

433B1474A0E645DDBC4FEE375931FB1F.description:
Choose a
piece of music or a
musical performance
and evaluate the
quality according to
specified criteria.
Support point of view
with evidence and
appropriate musical
vocabulary.

3D27F81E8EFE432E88F87879F8156DDF.description:
Describe
personal evaluation of
musical works or
performances based
on criteria, using
appropriate musical
vocabulary.

0BAD265CE9CB48A280A2ADEAFB2EA065.description: Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

A4321D2B8DAE49ABBAF185CEB9873014.description:
When listening
to music, communicate
clearly how the use of
musical elements and
performance choices
might create the
intended effect.

02C3EA8310D24BA4A328318803530358.description:
Summarize and
explain how artistic
qualities are used in
musicians’
interpretations.

7DDBA4D82E3441E095DD76CD52F6F244.description: Interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

47DD42C35F754BA0A21F1E4CA78D4924.description:
With limited
guidance, communicate
clearly the importance
of structure, musical
elements, and context.

19FB57B2EE5A46B390D164018F236469.description:
Clearly
communicate personal
preferences when
selecting music for
listening or performing
and describe how the
use of musical
elements and context
influence the choice.

09C8B67AD4F447EAAA8608F045905CCC.description:
Demonstrate
and describe, citing
evidence, how
responses to music are
informed by structure,
use of musical
elements, and context
(social, cultural, and
historical).

597F354B23884CEEB400178298867E70.description:
Select music
and describe, citing
evidence, how personal
interests, experiences,
and purposes influence
musical choice.

C32E7FD6B72448E89B4AAB3D4364EA24.description:
Discuss
readiness of a varied
repertoire of music for
public performance,
based on experience of
time, place, and culture
from which the music is
chosen.

4B2DE8992B6D4AFAA4A22502F752E327.description:
Interact
effectively with the
audience and other
performers to convey
the artistic purpose of
the piece. Reflect with
the listeners in
discussion or other
activity appropriate to
the context.

AAD46171FE7C4E6EA62F6F929BE17F39.description:
Perform a
varied repertoire of
music with artistic
purpose,
demonstrating
technical accuracy.

FF16EC1669DC4F80A663749CDF9DC62F.description:
Perform
appropriately for
audience and purpose.

A1D3C5F7E72B462880F69E038BF8DBE0.description:
Communicate
purpose through music
performance, paying
attention to accuracy
and interpretation.

FD64784A749C48B78A1E442896539B7E.description: Convey meaning through the presentation of artistic work.

66D4EF46FA814D0CA5886639B74EA254.description:
Apply feedback
to improve and refine
music in rehearsal.

9F7A470A6C114AD4BEB4DE6B18A50530.description:
With teacher
guidance, identify
feedback and explore
multiple points of view
during the rehearsal
process, in order to
improve performance
quality, technical
accuracy and artistic
purpose.

24A8F5734A584792AA2FBDAFCA2C0DBB.description:
Identify and
apply appropriate
feedback to rehearse
and refine
performance.

27A187176E154602A2E92BF4572B28C8.description: Develop and refine artistic work for presentation.

9FA6B6B64F954628A268705984384118.description:
Read iconic and/or
standard notation in
performance of musical
ideas.

30084AD1B6B14B07AB964BE6510A7DF3.description:
Demonstrate and
explain artistic qualities
when performing musical
ideas.

A24ADB9C8AB14BD38E4A07B1F48CBFDC.description:
Demonstrate an
understanding of musical
contexts when describing
choices of music selected
for performance.

2BA2311B4A3643829A7A652934677AA5.description:
With teacher
guidance, select a piece of
music to read, analyze, and
perform with attention to
context and creative intent.
Justify and support
performance decisions.

C52F49D6A3484E5B8731C36F822F0F40.description:
Read and
perform from iconic
and/or standard
notation.

43C09FB7D7E54CA7ABB809A636807E35.description:
Demonstrate
and explain how intent
is conveyed through
artistic qualities.

93C7E33D2E0E4688968FE3E69777763E.description:
Describe and
analyze how context
(historical, cultural, social,
and personal) informs
performance.

9EEDFF8413C041628F31327393FE0ADD.description:
Describe personal
preferences for the
selection of music for
performance based on
purpose, context, and
technical skill.

DA72F55A9DA34AEC9D4FAC560E50C060.description: Analyze, interpret, and select artistic work for presentation.

FC5D3816C011473CAAAED886D907A61D.description:
Present a
classroom version,
incorporating
refinements, and explain
connections to the artistic
purpose, using
appropriate technology as
available.

E626E001080348999FAB83D16F6C0CFC.description:
Think critically
to evaluate and refine
personal musical ideas
in response to feedback
and document revisions.

36C057C1CB9C440B8A35A9B35AFE74AC.description:
Present a
classroom version of
personal musical ideas
and summarize
connections to artistic
purpose.

9068F57C4493411A980744C7D701CC09.description:
Apply given
criteria to evaluate and
summarize refinements
to personal musical
ideas.

809816E6D62E4E638BDB16BFE8490875.description:
With
increasing
independence, use
standard notation,
iconic notation or
recording technology
effectively to create
and document personal
musical ideas. Clearly
communicate creative
choices.

802AFACA34BE43DB82F3C45581F03465.description:
Select, present,
explain, and document
musical choices with
connections to purpose
and context.

5DBF55B1FD944DAF95EC971BEFA591FB.description: Organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

28902DB91C244ABFA89E97BB8F976012.description:
Create music
with intermediate-level
melodic, rhythmic,
dynamic, and formal
elements, in response
to artistic stimuli, using
appropriate technology
as available.

2BC03085899443039BE1CD8A563726A9.description:
With
increasing
independence, create
musical ideas for
classroom and
personal composition
activities, using
appropriate technology
as available.

A28E7FC000ED4537997CA58E4827A7DB.description:
Conceptualize
and generate musical
ideas for an artistic
purpose and context,
using appropriate
technology as
available.

B0CA720A5FBB434BA9C8ED973106FA0C.description: Generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.
